title: Zed acting like he owns blind pick after getting silver :(
body:
https://imgur.com/6DGlcyJ
https://imgur.com/vuUYLz6
https://imgur.com/hCw2NBU
https://imgur.com/1tED60c
he knew i was going mid. He just wanted to show how me how big his dick was by trolling mid
it was kinda big for a 14 y/o
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: this is why I don't play blind.
pray with me for a swift 14 days ban U_U {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

but he wont get banned. blind pick is the wild west, there are no roles, nor the best intentions there.

if you wanted to guarantee a role, play draft.

> [{quoted}](name=Snapp2Kill,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7r6HPMXl,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-04-17T20:06:45.644+0000)
>
> but he wont get banned. blind pick is the wild west, there are no roles, nor the best intentions there.
> 
> if you wanted to guarantee a role, play draft.

it isn't bannable to take someones role, its blind pick casual after all.
but messing up someones gaming experience is.

> [{quoted}](name=need a namexD,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7r6HPMXl,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-04-17T18:44:08.862+0000)
>
> pray with me for a swift 14 days ban U_U {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

Idk if he technically did anything wrong. He can play mid if he wants. He wasn't assigned a role. Calling roles is something people do as a courtesy to ensure that every meta role is chosen. It's not a rule that needs to be followed. I recommend ditching the blind pick, or at least not going into it expecting to get the role you want.

You do realize that call order isn't enforceable in blind pick? 

He really isnt trolling if it's not a rule.

> [{quoted}](name=need a namexD,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7r6HPMXl,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-04-17T19:03:09.547+0000)
>
> 3/12

He had ABOUT a 0.6 kda. You had a 1.0, Jhin had the worst kda at about a 0.4 or so. Pointing out the score means nothing really. If he trolled, I hope you reported it and it gets detected. But all we can see is a guy play mid and get outplayed, along with pretty much the rest of your team except top lane.
well i mean he just went straight bot gave 2 kills then started sharing exp and creeps with me mid again
I'm more concerned about that Jhin.
How could he know that u are going mid if its blind pick? Anyone can go mid...
